How about the inclusion of an object's 'Wearable' option? This could involve dressing the character in clothes suitable to the storyline: Shoes, socks, slacks, shirt, cloak, spectacles, bandana, false nose, wig, flippers, lipstick etc., each item set to be removable or not.

>take sword
>take helmet
>wear helmet
>i
You are carrying a sword and you are wearing a helmet.
>x self
As handsome as ever. I am wearing a helmet.
>remove helmet
>i
You are carrying a sword and a helmet.
